name: Jueyun Chili
desc: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

value.text:
Found in the wild
Recommendation: Found in Qingce Village

customize.name: Jueyun Chili Seed
customize.desc: A seed obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality seed full of life, just waiting to be planted in the fields of the Realm Within. After some time, it will grow into Jueyun Chilis.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Yaoyao
customize.desc: Streetward Rambler's youngest disciple. A gentle and caring "little adult."

customize.name: Xiangling
customize.desc: A renowned chef from Liyue. She's extremely passionate about cooking and excels at making her signature hot and spicy dishes.

customize.name: Stir-Fried Filet
customize.desc: Sliced meat flash-fried in a wok. The mild Jueyun Chili adds just the right amount of kick to the delicious aroma of the meat. Perfect as an appetizer and also goes well with rice.

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Jueyun Chili
customize.desc: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

customize.name: Flash-Fried Filet
customize.desc: Beidou's specialty. They say that Beidou once learned some tricks from Xiangling, making some refinements and adding more flavor to this dish. If you can clean it out in one go, perhaps you might impress her.

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Jueyun Chili
customize.desc: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

customize.name: Jueyun Chili Chicken
customize.desc: Chicken in a dressing, served cold. The way the dish has been prepared captures the succulence of the chicken perfectly. Beneath the glowing gold skin, the meat has a mildly hot flavor.

customize.name: Fowl
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

customize.name: Jueyun Chili
customize.desc: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

customize.name: Pepper
customize.desc: Peppery. Cuts through oily flavors and excites the taste buds. Goes best on meat.

customize.name: Rockin' Riffin' Chicken!
customize.desc: Xinyan's specialty. Its demonic appearance hides an absolutely demonic spiciness. Eat it, tear up, eat some more, and don't stop till you drop! Surely only a demon could have invented such a dish!

customize.name: Fowl
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

customize.name: Jueyun Chili
customize.desc: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

customize.name: Pepper
customize.desc: Peppery. Cuts through oily flavors and excites the taste buds. Goes best on meat.

customize.name: Mint Salad
customize.desc: A fragrant salad dish. Finely chopped Jueyun Chilis blended with a sauce and mixed with Mint leaves. It looks like nothing special, but it has surprisingly potent powers of refreshment and reinvigoration. It is also the perfect palate-cleanser after a greasy, indulgent meal.

customize.name: Mint
customize.desc: A refreshingly cool ingredient. The cool, fresh flavor can cut through the heat of many dishes.

customize.name: Jueyun Chili
customize.desc: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

customize.name: Black-Back Perch Stew
customize.desc: A poached fish dish. The fresh and tasty fish fillets are tender and juicy. The secret to this recipe is adding powdered Violetgrass into the heated oil to give the dish that aromatic scent. It's spicy, but not too spicy.

customize.name: Fish
customize.desc: A fresh fillet of fish. Handled properly, it can make a rich dish.

customize.name: Jueyun Chili
customize.desc: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

customize.name: Salt
customize.desc: A savory seasoning. A precise but adequate amount will elevate the quality of the cuisine.

customize.name: Violetgrass
customize.desc: A small flower with strong vitality. It is said that its downward-blooming flower keeps its fragrance from dissipating.

customize.name: Wanmin Restaurant's Boiled Fish
customize.desc: Xiangling's specialty. This is the signature dish of the Wanmin Restaurant, combining Xiangling's heartfelt passion for cuisine. Anyone who tastes it will gain a pure appreciation for gourmet food amid the hearty and addictive blend of flavors.

customize.name: Fish
customize.desc: A fresh fillet of fish. Handled properly, it can make a rich dish.

customize.name: Jueyun Chili
customize.desc: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

customize.name: Salt
customize.desc: A savory seasoning. A precise but adequate amount will elevate the quality of the cuisine.

customize.name: Violetgrass
customize.desc: A small flower with strong vitality. It is said that its downward-blooming flower keeps its fragrance from dissipating.

customize.name: Qingce Stir Fry
customize.desc: A dish cooked over a roaring fire. They say it was originally just a rustic dish that everyone in Qingce Village knew how to make. But quite unexpectedly, its crispy and spicy dishes gained the recognition of people from elsewhere, and thus began to spread throughout the Liyue region.

customize.name: Mushroom
customize.desc: Hardy common fungi. Can grow anywhere with the right amount of shade and moisture.

customize.name: Lotus Head
customize.desc: An aquatic plant native to Liyue that grows and blooms in pairs. One is fragrant, and the other bitter. It's said to make a good herbal medicine.

customize.name: Jueyun Chili
customize.desc: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

customize.name: Cabbage
customize.desc: A layered, leafy vegetable. Said to have originally been an ornamental plant, it certainly looks great in the pot.

customize.name: Qingce Household Dish
customize.desc: Yaoyao's specialty. It looks rather mundane as it is not displayed with the same luxurious aesthetic as dishes prepared by a fancy restaurant. However, as soon as you take a bite, the flavor immediately offers you a fragrant and intimate experience, certain to leave an ever-lasting impression. After a single taste, what's on your tongue will be on your heart for good. As for the reason, maybe the secret ingredient to this recipe is simply "caring."

customize.name: Mushroom
customize.desc: Hardy common fungi. Can grow anywhere with the right amount of shade and moisture.

customize.name: Lotus Head
customize.desc: An aquatic plant native to Liyue that grows and blooms in pairs. One is fragrant, and the other bitter. It's said to make a good herbal medicine.

customize.name: Jueyun Chili
customize.desc: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

customize.name: Cabbage
customize.desc: A layered, leafy vegetable. Said to have originally been an ornamental plant, it certainly looks great in the pot.

customize.name: Jueyun Guoba
customize.desc: One of Liyue's specialty snacks. Stir-fried ham and Jueyun Chili sprinkled on a crispy crust made from Rice and Horsetail create a refined, meaty snack that transforms humble Rice into a hot delicacy.

customize.name: Horsetail
customize.desc: A purple plant that sometimes grows amidst Silvergrass but grows taller, straighter, and plumper — like an aristocrat among the paupers.

customize.name: Rice
customize.desc: A grain crop commonly found in Teyvat. People of all walks of life enjoy its distinct grainy texture. As the saying goes, "The same kind of rice can feed one hundred kinds of people."

customize.name: Ham
customize.desc: Smoked leg meat. Even the thinnest slice is packed full of flavor.

customize.name: Jueyun Chili
customize.desc: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

customize.name: Minty Meat Rolls
customize.desc: A sour-and-spicy dish. The marinated meat has been thinly sliced and rolled into the mint leaves, before being brushed with a sauce blend containing Jueyun Chilis. The unique mint flavor adds the finishing touch to this dish, turning it into an excellent addition to any cold platter.

customize.name: Mint
customize.desc: A refreshingly cool ingredient. The cool, fresh flavor can cut through the heat of many dishes.

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Jueyun Chili
customize.desc: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

customize.name: Humbly Enough
customize.desc: A spiced tofu dish. Sautéed tofu is stir-fried with the sauce until browned and ready to serve. Despite the ordinary ingredients, the resulting dish is particularly mellow and fragrant, a perfect partner for rice. It can be said to be the home cook's dish of choice.

customize.name: Tofu
customize.desc: Freshly made bean product that has a silky-smooth tender texture.

customize.name: Jueyun Chili
customize.desc: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

customize.name: Flour
customize.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

customize.name: Sugar
customize.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

customize.name: Jade Parcels
customize.desc: An exquisite-looking dish. The ham's sweetness is locked inside the fresh vegetables, drizzled with a spicy broth. Delicious is an understatement.

customize.name: Lotus Head
customize.desc: An aquatic plant native to Liyue that grows and blooms in pairs. One is fragrant, and the other bitter. It's said to make a good herbal medicine.

customize.name: Jueyun Chili
customize.desc: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

customize.name: Cabbage
customize.desc: A layered, leafy vegetable. Said to have originally been an ornamental plant, it certainly looks great in the pot.

customize.name: Ham
customize.desc: Smoked leg meat. Even the thinnest slice is packed full of flavor.

customize.name: Chili-Mince Cornbread Buns
customize.desc: A traditional snack from Liyue. The fresh dough is turned out into a round, rested, and then placed inside a cage to steam. The meat and vegetables are then washed and diced, before being fried quickly in an oiled wok. When eaten, the fried condiments must be placed into the empty space in the middle of the buns before they are eaten together. Between the crisp vegetables and the flavorful meat, this is solid, great flavor.
